catalog_script_client.name: Projector availability check

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_7568c1de9715311078b6faafe153afb1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rent a projector">e4ac033d9715711078b6faafe153afbc</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:5b101fb19755711078b6faafe153afbe</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Projector availability check</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
    var startDate = g_form.getValue('rent');
    var endDate = g_form.getValue('return');
    /*var sDevice = g_form.getValue('select_device');*/

    var ga = new GlideAjax('IsDeviceRented');

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'availableCIs');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_start', startDate);
    ga.addParam('sysparm_end', endDate);
    ga.addParam('sysparm_device', newValue);
    ga.getXML(getInfo);

    function getInfo(response) {
    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
    var reply = JSON.parse(answer);
    
    if (reply == 'true') {
        g_form.addInfoMessage('The selected device is available on these dates.');
    } else {
        g_form.clearValue('select_device');
        g_form.addInfoMessage('The selected device is not available on these dates. Please change your dates or choose another device.');
    }
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-17 18:43:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7568c1de9715311078b6faafe153afb1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Projector availability check</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Projector rental" source="x_1100479_projecto">e241477997d1711078b6faafe153af76</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Projector rental">e241477997d1711078b6faafe153af76</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7568c1de9715311078b6faafe153afb1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-22 10:45:46</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
